basis: User stated a concrete action plan to eat Greek yogurt with berries as the snack after dinner and to perform a 2-minute fullness check with a 60-second pause if urges arise; this indicates the planned action aligns with the last numeric suggestion (S = 2.93) and was intended to be executed.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user appears committed to gradual improvement without demanding perfection.
negative_thought_patterns: No prominent self-defeating beliefs; frames progress as incremental and non-perfection-driven.
emotional_triggers: Urge to snack noted as a trigger; user plans to pause, suggesting awareness and coping rather than impulsivity.
coaching_notes: Continue with a supportive, non-judgmental tone; acknowledge and reinforce the successful action (mindful snack, portion control, and planned pause). Encourage consistent logging of fullness and reaffirm commitment to small, sustainable changes. Prepare for common barriers (time pressure, cravings) with quick, ready-to-use mindful options.
